item.title: Aspose.ZIP for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.ZIP for Java 24.1. Key Summary Issue Type ZIPJAVA-1 Add support for Rar. Feature ZIPNET-1112 Extract multi-volume zip archive. Feature ZIPNET-1111 Set proper encoding for some charsets. Bug Public API and Backwards Incompatible Changes The following public types were added: Description com.
